About the Festival

The Otaku Festival is an annual event celebrating the vibrant world of anime, manga, and Japanese pop culture. Join us for an unforgettable experience filled with cosplay contests, gaming tournaments, and cultural showcases.

Featured Events

  • Cosplay Contest

    Show off your amazing costumes and compete for the grand prize!

  • Anime Screenings

    Watch your favorite anime on the big screen with fellow fans.

  • Gaming Zone

    Compete in popular games and showcase your skills.
